name: mattermost-cli
description: CLI tool to fetch and display Mattermost direct messages with secret redaction
author: Arda Sevinc <arda@ardasevinc.com>

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --target node --outfile dist/index.js --minify && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='dist/index.js';const c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8').replace(/^#!.*\n/,'');fs.writeFileSync(f,'#!/usr/bin/env node\n'+c)" && (chmod +x dist/index.js || true)
